# 无边界触达-数字化时代的高等教育

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/wu-bianjie-chuda-shuzihua-shidai-de-gaodengjiaoyu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/wu-bianjie-chuda-shuzihua-shidai-de-gaodengjiaoyu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install wu-bianjie-chuda-shuzihua-shidai-de-gaodengjiaoyu
wu-bianjie-chuda-shuzihua-shidai-de-gaodengjiaoyu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g wu-bianjie-chuda-shuzihua-shidai-de-gaodengjiaoyu
wu-bianjie-chuda-shuzihua-shidai-de-gaodengjiaoyu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
